item.description:
@D4L3_L3W1S wrote:

In Npc Handler On Some

On Item 2 Search Your Npc Ex. I Search Abyssal Demon :

[code] public static int abyssaldemon[] = {
4272};

public static int randomabyssaldemon() {
    return abyssaldemon[(int) (Math.random() * abyssaldemon.length)];
}[/code]

This means whip - 4272

just change to …

[code] public static int abyssaldemon[] = {
995};

public static int randomabyssaldemon() {
    return abyssaldemon[(int) (Math.random() * abyssaldemon.length)];
}[/code]

Now Save…

Ok On My Source The Drops Amount Are Handled In The Npc Handler

So Open It Up.

Search :

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomabyssaldemon(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

This Loads The Drop From Item2.Java

and where it says :

npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

Change The One To Anything You Want .

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomabyssaldemon(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 999999999, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

That Code Makes An Abyssal Demon Drop 999Mill
